basic_information.scholarship_name: Jan Douglas Endowed Scholarship for Computer Science

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Computer Science. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Computer Science major Minimum 2.5 GPA Completed at least 60 hours of credit Provide personal statement outlining career goals Expect to graduate from the University of Central Oklahoma Financial need may be considered Two faculty recommendation letters

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Computer Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Computer Science-Applied   or SIS_Major_2 is Computer Science-Info Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Data Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Software Engineering   or SIS_Major is Computer Science   or SIS_Major is Computer Science-Applied   or SIS_Major is Computer Science-Info Science   or SIS_Major is Data Science   or SIS_Major is Software Engineering
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Computer Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Computer Science-Applied   or SIS_Major_2 is Computer Science-Info Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Data Science   or SIS_Major_2 is Software Engineering   or SIS_Major is Computer Science   or SIS_Major is Computer Science-Applied   or SIS_Major is Computer Science-Info Science   or SIS_Major is Data Science   or SIS_Major is Software Engineering

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
